**Email Agent Run Summary (12:27 PM UTC)**

The email agent started but was **terminated before completion** (received SIGKILL). Here's what happened:

**Progress:**
- ✅ Synced inbox (49 seconds)
- ✅ Found 20 messages (19 new since last check)
- ✅ Started processing message pk=2 from [REDACTED-EMAIL] ("Re: About my human;")
- ❌ Killed while generating response

The agent was in the middle of drafting a reply when it was terminated. No emails were sent this run.

**Previous run (11:22 AM) was successful:**
- Sent 2 responses to [REDACTED-EMAIL] (messages pk=2 and pk=3)

The termination was likely due to timeout or resource limits. The agent will run again in an hour (1:27 PM UTC) to continue processing.
